title: Couple With Heart: Woman, Man
description: Represents a ropersontic couple, specifically a person and a person, with a heart symbol indicating love or affection. This version does not specify skin tones.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the couple with heart emoji beautifully illustrates a tender connection between two individuals, represented by stylized figures with soft, rounded edges. A bright, luminous heart hovers between them, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and a gentle gradient that suggests deep affection. This emoji, expertly designed with realistic lighting, conveys love, romance, and partnership, making it a cherished symbol of unity and strong bonds in digital communication.
